About Us

Nimbus was born as a concept restaurant to be a part of Chef Abhi's front-end development portfolio. As much as I enjoy Indian food, I cannot imagine the level of challenges that go into running and operation a succesful culinary venture of the magnitude that is portrayed on this website.{" "}
